Detailed Description

Interface adding to component static info functionality existing only for real components.

Real components are components which can be created in memory.

Definition at line 18 of file IRealComponentStaticInfo.h.

virtual IComponent* icomp::IRealComponentStaticInfo::CreateComponent ( ) const [pure virtual]

Create component instance.

Returns:
pointer to created component or NULL if this component cannot be created.
